homeCourseDetails: ✔ 30 Hours of Utah-Approved Home Study Course
✔ 6 Hours of Behind-the-Wheel Instruction with a Licensed Instructor
services.homeCourseDesc: This package is ideal for students who prefer flexible, self-paced learning. Complete the 30-hour state-approved driver education course from the comfort of your home, followed by 6 hours of personalized, behind-the-wheel instruction with a licensed instructor. Perfect for busy schedules or independent learners. All instruction meets Utah state licensing requirements.
weekendTestDetails: ✔ Bring Valid Learner’s Permit or Other Accepted Documents
services.weekendTestDesc: Available only on the weekend, this road test is administered by a certified third-party examiner. Be prepared to complete driving maneuvers such as parking, lane changes, signaling, etc. Please bring one of the following: Valid Utah Learner Permit, Temporary Operator License, Foreign License (Must be accompanied by No Privilege document).

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.text: We’re here to help. Give us a call:
contact.address: 1265 W 500 N, Salt Lake City, UT 84116

items.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash only for all our services. Please make sure to bring the exact amount to avoid any inconvenience.

items.question: What documents do I need to bring for my driving lessons?
items.answer:
Please bring one of the following:
  • Valid Utah Learner Permit
  • Temporary Operator License
  • Foreign License (Must be accompanied by No Privilege document)

items.question: How do I schedule a driving lesson or road test?
items.answer: We are open 7 days a week (Monday to Sunday). Please call to make an appointment in advance to secure your preferred time.

items.question: Do you provide vehicles for the road test?
items.answer: For your convenience, we supply a well-maintained car during the road test, eliminating the need to bring a vehicle.
